statements: SELECT * FROM goods_movement WHERE movement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM goods_movement WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT status FROM goods_movement WHERE location_id = 1001;
SELECT movement_id, location_id, timestamp, status FROM goods_movement WHERE status IN ('active', 'completed') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_movements FROM goods_movement WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM goods_movement WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT movement_id, status FROM goods_movement WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY status;
SELECT * FROM goods_movement WHERE status IN ('Shipped', 'Delivered') AND location_id = 2;
SELECT movement_id, location_id, timestamp FROM goods_movement WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY location_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_movements FROM goods_movement WHERE status = 'Processing';
SELECT * FROM goods_tracking
SELECT goods_name, location_name FROM goods_tracking WHERE tracking_id = 1
SELECT location_name, goods_name FROM goods_tracking ORDER BY movement_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE longitude < 0
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT tracking_id, goods_name, location_name, movement_timestamp FROM goods_tracking WHERE tracking_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM goods_tracking WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT goods_name, location_name, COUNT(tracking_id) AS total_movements FROM goods_tracking GROUP BY goods_name, location_name HAVING total_movements > 10;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0 ORDER BY longitude ASC;
SELECT goods_name, location_name, movement_timestamp FROM goods_tracking WHERE goods_name LIKE '%Electronics%' AND (location_name = 'Warehouse A' OR location_name = 'Warehouse B');
SELECT * FROM Goods;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Goods WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Locations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT tracking_id, timestamp FROM MovementTracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Goods WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, location_id FROM Goods WHERE id = 5
SELECT location_id, name FROM Locations WHERE latitude < 40.00 ORDER BY longitude DESC
SELECT tracking_id, timestamp FROM MovementTracking WHERE goods_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT g.name, l.name AS location_name FROM Goods g JOIN Locations l ON g.location_id = l.location_id
SELECT * FROM LocationData ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT goods_name, quantity FROM Goods WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_name FROM Warehouse INNER JOIN LocationData ON Warehouse.location_id = LocationData.location_id;
SELECT movement_id, movement_date FROM MovementHistory WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY movement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LocationData ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT goods_name, quantity, location_name FROM Goods INNER JOIN LocationData ON Goods.location_id = LocationData.location_id;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_name FROM Warehouse INNER JOIN LocationData ON Warehouse.location_id = LocationData.location_id WHERE warehouse_name LIKE '%Store%';
SELECT goods_name, from_location_id, to_location_id, movement_date FROM MovementHistory WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Goods;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Goods WHERE id = 1;
SELECT country, city, region FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Movements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, capacity FROM Warehouses WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Goods;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Goods WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT g.name, l.country, l.city FROM Goods g JOIN Locations l ON g.location = l.location_id;
SELECT g.name, w.capacity FROM Goods g JOIN Warehouses w ON g.location = w.location_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, g.name, t.quantity, m.timestamp FROM Transactions t JOIN Goods g ON t.goods_id = g.id JOIN Movements m ON t.movement_id = m.movement_id;
